ai-landing.banner_desc: Welcome to the Fujairah Open: Where passion, power, and perseverance come together in the heart of the UAE.
ai-landing.about_desc: Leverage powerful algorithms that analyze data, recognize patterns and make prediction.
ai-landing.feature_desc: Elite Taekwondo: Experience the Fujairah Open Difference
ai-landing.feature_desc1: Prepare for unparalleled excitement! The Fujairah Open consistently attracts Olympic and World Champions from around the globe, making it a premier proving ground for the sport's elite. Experience world-class Taekwondo and watch history in the making as the top competitors vie for glory.
ai-landing.feature_title2: Seamless Experience: Your Journey to Fujairah
ai-landing.feature_desc2: Focus on your performance, not the logistics. We offer complimentary visa processing for all participants, ensuring a smooth entry into the UAE. Additionally, enjoy access to highly affordable, quality accommodation packages, making this prestigious international event accessible to all athletes.
ai-landing.feature_title3: The Future of Taekwondo: Latest Technology
ai-landing.feature_desc3: Step onto the mats at a truly modern championship. The Fujairah Open utilizes the latest advancements in scoring and judging technology to ensure fairness, accuracy, and a dynamic event experience. Compete on a world-class stage that sets the standard for international Taekwondo events.
ai-landing.discover_title: Stay at the forefront of technology
ai-landing.step_desc1: Elite champions compete on our mats
ai-landing.research_desc: We research generative models and how to align them with human values.
ai-landing.community_desc: Developing beneficial AI systems requires people from a wide range of disciplines and backgrounds
ai-landing.faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our FAQ
ai-landing.news_desc: Read more about latest news and our special event
ai-landing.cta_title: Join us on this exciting journey!
ai-landing.cta_desc: Unlock the potential of AI and drive innovation for your business.
ai-landing.visa_apply_new: Apply for a new team member visa
ai-landing.visa_form_upload_passport: Upload passport scan on the left - we'll automatically fill the details for you
ai-landing.hotel_add_hotels: Add hotels to your cart from the New Booking tab
ai-landing.faq_q1: How do I apply for a visa for the Fujairah Open Championship?
ai-landing.faq_a1: Navigate to the Visa section and click 'Start Application'. Upload your passport scan and our AI system will automatically fill in your details. Complete the form with your team information and submit. You'll receive updates on your visa status through your account dashboard.
ai-landing.faq_q2: What documents do I need to upload for visa application?
ai-landing.faq_a2: You need to upload: (1) Passport scan, (2) Personal photo, (3) Global License (if applicable), and (4) National ID (for citizens of Iran, Iraq, Afghanistan, and Pakistan). All documents should be high-quality scans in JPG, PNG, or PDF format (max 5MB).
ai-landing.faq_q3: How does the hotel booking system work?
ai-landing.faq_a3: Browse available hotels in the Hotel section, select your preferred hotel and room type, then add to cart. You can add multiple hotels to your cart and confirm all bookings at once. After submission, bookings are reviewed by the organizing committee and you'll receive payment instructions.
ai-landing.faq_q4: Can I book hotels for multiple team members together?
ai-landing.faq_a4: Yes! Our system supports grouped bookings. Add multiple hotel reservations to your cart and submit them together. All bookings in a group will be managed as one unit with a single status, payment process, and combined invoice.
ai-landing.faq_q5: What languages does the portal support?
ai-landing.faq_a5: The portal supports 6 languages: English, Arabic (العربية), German (Deutsch), Portuguese (Português), Chinese (简体中文), and Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia). Switch languages using the language selector in the header menu.
ai-landing.faq_q6: How do I pay for hotel bookings?
ai-landing.faq_a6: After your booking is approved by the OC, you'll receive an invoice with bank transfer details. Upload your payment proof in 'My Bookings' section. Alternatively, you can request to pay on-site by providing a valid reason for admin approval.
